ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: If(ISPICKVAL(Hold_Out_Reason__c, 'Paychex Referral Network'),NOT(ISNULL( Hold_Out_Expiration__c )) && Hold_Out_Expiration__c > TODAY() + 120,NOT( ISNULL( Hold_Out_Expiration__c )) && Hold_Out_Expiration__c > TODAY() + 100)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: *** Hold out expiration has to be within the next 90 days. It can not exceed 90 days ***
